structure.unit: ARTICLE XXII. PERSONAL INJURY PROTECTION MEDICAL PROVIDERS

text.section:
Sec. 8A-422. Registration Required.
All PIP Medical Providers operating within the geographic boundaries of Miami-Dade County shall be registered with the Department. Registration shall be renewed annually.
Proof of current registration with the County shall be prominently displayed in a common public area of all PIP Medical Provider locations.
Each PIP Medical Provider location shall be registered separately, regardless of whether the location is operated under the same business name or management as another PIP Medical Provider location.
